titles.title: Ensuring Efficiency and Fairness in Federal Subcontracting Act of 2024
Ensuring Efficiency and Fairness in Federal Subcontracting Act of 2024
To ensure efficiency and fairness in Federal subcontracting, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
